::: {.cell}

::: {.cell}

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**T2.2 Deciduous temperate forests**]((/efg-info/T2_2.qmd).)


The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: T2.2.web.mix v1.0.


> Major and minor occurrences were initially identified using consensus land-cover maps (Tuanmu et al. 2014) and then cropped to selected terrestrial ecoregions (Dinerstein et al. 2017) at 30 arc seconds spatial resolution. Ecoregions were selected if: i) their descriptions mentioned features consistent with those identified in the profile of the Ecosystem Functional Group; and ii) if their location was consistent with the ecological drivers described in the profile..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- raster map in repository ([GeoTIFF version uploaded to Mapbox](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T2_2_web_mix))
 - raster/vector files in repository ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))
 - individual raster/vector files in Zenodo ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091099))
